# Release Hygiene Warn-Only Hooks

Warn-only hook pack for release and changelog hygiene checks.

## Scope

- Trigger for release preparation and changelog-related updates.
- Guidance only; does not block or mutate files.

## Messages

- Confirm venv activation pattern for Python commands.
- Ensure changelog entries are concise and user-focused.
- Verify no sensitive/customer data appears in release notes.
